alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:49PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai and Coconino Counties through 215 PM MST... At 149 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Ash Fork, or 31 miles north of Chino Valley, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williams. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 148 and 161. State Route 89 between mile markers 351 and 362. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
